title: New: Ocean Calling – White Light
body:
**Ocean Calling** (Sophie Wilkie) draws the best elements of M83 (over the top, movie ready crescendos) and Grimes (more intimate, poetic lyricism) to illustrious effect.

Her newest track _White Light_ is another epic, yet delightfully pop-aware number, perfectly suited to the spacious, picturesque environments which the majority of her photos document. Check out _White Light_ below.

Check out White Light \[…\]
